name: .TIMELINE File Extension
summary: Learn about .TIMELINE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A TIMELINE file is a data file created by Timeline, a free, cross-platform program used to create and organize events along a chronological timeline. It contains one or more events and milestones, along with properties, such as the date, description, category, and icon. TIMELINE files are saved in XML format.

content: TIMELINE files are most often opened by Timeline but they may also be uploaded to and opened by Timeline Viewer in a web browser. Since TIMELINE files are stored in XML format, they may be opened and edited using an XML or text editor.
To create a TIMELINE file in Timeline, select File → New..., add events, then select File → Save as.
To open a TIMELINE file in Timeline, select File → Open...... or Open Recent and choose the TIMELINE file you want to open.
To export a TIMELINE file in Timeline, select File → Export and choose the format you want to export to, such as .SVG, .CSV, or .PNG.
NOTE: Timeline is open source software and is developed by The Timeline Authors.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
